column5: It turns out (after I put on my glasses) is really said "seedless" They're easy to grow though and quite inexpensive.
might catch is a vegan muskie?
Where do you attach your line to the bait??  I don't think it will hold up to any speed trolling either.  Pretty poor design.  P3TA will love it though!!!
I must have gotten a bad batch of seeds.
Do they come in the pickled variety also  Joey
Homegrown Weedless  but can you smoke it?
